SENT.plain: This study describes a method for obtaining the distribution of a given cell type in histological sections, as revealed by a specific immunological marker
Two hundred fifty-six contiguous microscopic fields were analysed, and a cellular map was automatically constructed
The resulting images were stored on magnetic media for subsequent quantification and statistical tests
The method was applied to the analysis of 20 small cleaved-cell lymphomas in which the monoclonal antibody Ki-67 was used to mark proliferating cells
Clusters of proliferative cells were observed in both diffuse and nodular lymphomas
Cellularity and the percentage of marked cells were not significantly different in the two types of tumors
